sentence.Network_en: He lacked the judgment and political acumen for the post of chairman.
sentence.Network_cn: 他欠缺做主席应具备的判断力和政治敏锐度。
她的经营能力绝非一般.

sentence.Network_en: His business acumen has made him very successful.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的商业头脑使他很成功.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新东方GRE词汇 - 豆丁网 ... acrimonious adj. 刻薄的 acumen ? n. 敏锐, 聪明 acute adj. 敏锐的，锐角的；急性的.
新东方GRE词汇 - 豆丁网 ... acrimonious adj. 刻薄的 acumen ? n. 敏锐, 聪明 acute adj. 敏锐的，锐角的；急性的.
谁给个所有英语单词联想记忆的方法_百度知道 ... 26，Zest 乐趣、风味 1，Acumen 敏锐；洞察力 2，Baffle 受挫；困惑.
一、敏锐度（Acumen），帮助你产生关键的营运洞见。 二、分配（Allocation），权衡取舍后集中资源。

list.abs: [5] 财务敏感度（financial acumen）是指对财务管理原则的理解以及应用能力，以确保公司决策在财务上是健全的、负责任的。包括:  …
acumen的翻译中文意思|用法|音标|-在线英汉词典 ... n. 敏锐；聪明 political acumen 政治才干 business acumen 营业本领.
political acumen , have sturdy good faith .政治敏锐，具有坚定的理想信念。
Entertainment The Apprentice_BBC Chinese ... budding 萌发中的 business acumen 商业头脑 hilarious 有趣的.
...查兰曾经写过一本小册子《CEO说》，强调一种叫做"商业才智"(business acumen)的东西：从街头小贩到乡间鞋店，直至《财富》5…

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Latin, sharpness, point', from acuere 'sharpen' (see acute)

entry.def: Acumen is the ability to make good judgments and quick decisions.

example.ex: His sharp business acumen meant he quickly rose to the top.
example.tran: 他精明的商业头脑令其青云直上。

auth_sentence.content: Technical acumen in cell culture including upstream and downstream bio-processing.
auth_sentence.res_content: Technical acumen in cell culture including upstream and downstream bio-processing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Technical acumen in cell culture including upstream and downstream bio-processing.

auth_sentence.content: Exceptional commercial acumen and instincts; superior strategic marketing skills.
auth_sentence.res_content: Exceptional commercial acumen and instincts; superior strategic marketing skills.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Exceptional commercial acumen and instincts; superior strategic marketing skills.

auth_sentence.content: His father's business acumen rivaled his mother's journalistic instincts.
auth_sentence.res_content: His father's business acumen rivaled his mother's journalistic instincts.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His father's business acumen rivaled his mother's journalistic instincts.

stems_affixes.word_buile: acu尖,酸,锐利+te→adj.尖锐的,敏锐的
acu尖,酸,锐利+ity性质→尖的性质→尖锐
acu尖,酸,锐利+men表示名词→尖→敏锐
acu尖+punct点+ture表名词→acupuncture用尖[针]点→针炙

means.word_mean: 敏锐, 精明, 聪明

sentences.cn: 她的经营能力绝非一般。

sentences.en: He had demonstrated considerable business acumen.
sentences.cn: 他展示了出色的经商才能。
